name: Cave Bound
description:
Cavebound is a game about exploring and looting an infinite cave while bound to a rope.

Features:

  • 3 enemy types
  • A glitchy mess of collisions
  • A technically playable state

Yeah, there was a severe lack of time due to outside circumstances this time around. But we feel like we still learned a ton given that we went with something very unconventional to us in the form of procedural generation and fully physics based movement. I hope you can find some fun with it, no matter how borked it ended up!

Controls:

  • WASD : Movement
  • Space : jump
  • RMB -> pick up, throw
  • LMB -> interact, use held item
